translation.en: He began to feel more at ease.
The child failed to grasp the advanced topic.
She asked him to read her the story.
The two parties had difficulty communicating.
They stormed the party.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: They talked for hours to try and resolve the disagreement.
They moved the bricks together so the job would go faster.
translation.tam: Darmok. Darmok at Tanagra. Darmok and Jilad at Tanagra.

translation.en: The child didn't want to go to listen to their lessons anymore.
She relentlessly tried to solve the problem, undeterred by failure.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: She pointed to the kettle and asked if anyone wanted some tea.
The evidence was incontrovertible.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: They worked to bring the other party into their trap.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: His injury was incurable.
This was their problem to resolve.
The computer had halted it's execution.
Her headache was causing anguish.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: She said she was not interested in the offer of tea.
Rocks covered the road, making it unpassable.
After being told, she suddenly realized what she'd misunderstood.
He walked out the door.
